info.task: navigate from dropdown to collapsed disclosure button
info.title: Navigate from a dropdown to a collapsed disclosure button in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstLinkInDropdown
setupScript.description: sets the state of the first disclosure button to expanded, and sets focus on the first link of the associated dropdown

user: With the reading cursor on a link in the first dropdown, close the dropdown and return focus to the associated disclosure button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on a link in the first dropdown, close the dropdown and return focus to the associated disclosure button.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed
